text: Steve Tom (born September 20, 1953) is an American movie, and television actor. He has guest-starred in a number of television shows including Major Crimes, Modern Family, How I Met Your Mother, Drake & Josh, ER, NYPD Blue, Sleeper Cell, Two and a Half Men, Prison Break, The West Wing and other television series. For two seasons, he was in Funny or Die Presents. He also appeared in some movies The Campaign, The Guilt Trip, Seven Pounds, First Daughter, Disney's The Kid, Pulse, Rendition and Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen. Tom was born on September 20, 1953 in Houston, Texas. ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Houston
title: Steve Tom
